passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit. If the target is a champion, inflict them with Expose Weakness for 4 seconds, causing them to take (8% / 5%) increased damage from all sources (1.5s second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.
